catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 61
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: album containing brightly painted images of men and women meeting indoors, and on a boat; pages of cursive text; navy blue cover with title label on paper decorated with gold
medium: Ink, color, gold, and gold leaf on paper
title: The Tale of Hachikazuki, vol. 1
